Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1971...
Had first career hit on 8/25/1975, off Rollie Fingers (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/16/1975, off Bill Slayback (OAK)...
Injured on 4/26/1981 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/27/1982 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 5/6/1983...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Baltimore on 5/12/1984...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/7/1985 to a 4-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Injured on 4/11/1985 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
